name: io.github.imbenrabi/financial-modeling-prep-mcp-server
description: MCP server for Financial Modeling Prep API with 250+ financial data tools

package_arguments.name: --fmp-token
package_arguments.description: Financial Modeling Prep API access token

package_arguments.name: --port
package_arguments.description: Port number for HTTP server mode

package_arguments.name: --fmp-tool-sets
package_arguments.description: Comma-separated list of tool sets to load

environment_variables.name: FMP_ACCESS_TOKEN
environment_variables.description: Financial Modeling Prep API access token

environment_variables.name: PORT
environment_variables.description: Port number for HTTP server mode

environment_variables.name: FMP_TOOL_SETS
environment_variables.description: Comma-separated list of tool sets to load
